summary: The document is a journal entry from the Office of Legislative Counsel dated 10 November 1977, detailing various liaison activities and employment requests. It includes interactions with congressional offices, handling of Privacy Act requests related to the House Select Committee on Assassinations, and a visit by a Senate Select Committee on Intelligence staff member for badge issuance and review of intelligence materials.
key_findings: Interaction with Representative Douglas Applegate's office regarding an employment application.
Distribution of a CIA press release to Representative Mario Biaggi's office.
Request from Representative Richard T. Schulze's office for a CIA publication on Soviet commercial operations.
Arrangement of a meeting with Professor G. Robert Blakey, Chief Counsel of the House Select Committee on Assassinations.
Handling of Privacy Act requests from the House Select Committee on Assassinations staff without disclosing names.
Visit by Senate Select Committee on Intelligence staff member Keith Raffel for badge issuance and review of intelligence materials related to foreign security services.
keywords: Soviet Commercial Operations in the West
